options.fig.cap:
Figure 1. a) Modeled estimates (median +/- 95% Credible Intervals) of 
λ using either 10 separate models or a single model with ten varying intercepts. c-d) Fit of ISD relationships at 3 values of λ. Dots are raw data, lines are posterior medians, and shading is the 95% credible interval. Fits are from separate models. \label{single_and_varint_plot:plot}
options.label: unnamed-chunk-10
